TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ByteArrayTypeMapping extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Storage.RelationalTypeMapping

summary.para: Represents the mapping between a .NET array type and a database type.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.
